Parasite Slot 1 [8-bit]
Each parasite slot can hold 1 parasite of any type at any level. 
A player can only equip 1 parasite of the same type and the same level.
Equipped parasites can be rotated between the 3 slots by pressing L1 or L2.

0x01-0x06 = Surosa Lv 1-6
0x25-0x2a = Priday Lv 1-6
0x13-0x18 = Angara Lv 1-6
0x1f-0x24 = Rasti Lv 1-6
0x07-0x0c = Grattoni Lv 1-6
0x19-0x1e = Envia Lv 1
